item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik, 11–13 November 2024 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Demokrati (*): 0 seats
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 4–5 seats
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 1 seats
  • VESNA–Zelena stranka (Greens/EFA): 0 seats
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 0 seats
  • Gibanje Svoboda (RE): 2–3 seats
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 0–1 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik, 11–13 November 2024 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik, 11–13 November 2024 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Demokrati (*): 2.7–5.6%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 7.1–11.4%
  • Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 33.6–40.8%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 9.1–13.9%
  • VESNA–Zelena stranka (Greens/EFA): 3.5–6.7%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 1.5–3.9%
  • Gibanje Svoboda (RE): 19.2–25.4%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 6.8–11.1%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for Delo, 4–7 November 2024 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 5.0–8.7%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (PfE): 1.9–4.4%
  • Gibanje Svoboda (RE): 16.3–22.0%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 6.0–10.0%
  • Piratska stranka Slovenije (Greens/EFA): 1.1–3.1%
  • Konkretno (RE): 0.1–1.0%
  • Resni.ca (NI): 2.4–5.1%
  • Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 29.8–36.6%
  • Naša prihodnost (*): 0.1–1.0%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 7.2–11.5%
  • VESNA–Zelena stranka (Greens/EFA): 4.5–7.9%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 3.9–7.1%
  • Naša dežela (*): 0.1–1.0%
